androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextV.android:text: CS CONNECT
What is CS Connect?
CS Connect is a unique and effective real estate platform for real estate brokers and independent agents looking to earn higher revenue, commissions, and growth in their business.
Why should I join you? Will I get any exclusive treatment?

A) Our partners get a chance to earn higher commissions and revenues on various exclusive real estate projects apart from the market commissions. B) Free verified buyer leads will be assigned to you to further grow your business with plenty of new opportunities. C) An equipped marketing support will be provided in order to help you in achieving new heights in your endeavor.
CHANNEL PARTNERS
What is Channel Partner Code?

Channel Partner Code is a unique identification code of a partner registered with CS Connect. This code can be used to fetch out any details related to partner’s account, leads, brokerage, etc. from the system.
How to become a Channel Partner?
The moment you complete your registration, a code will be created which will be visible on your profile page.
What is Channel Partner Helpdesk?
Channel Partner Helpdesk include the company representatives, who will guide you in a regular basis on how you can achieve greater heights with CS Connect.
What is the fees to become a channel partner of CS Connect?
CS Connect has no enrolment fees as of now. Any individual, real estate firm or a brokerage business can become a channel partner with CS Connect.
RELATIONSHIP MANAGER
What is a Relationship Manager?
Relationship Manager is a dedicated company representative to support and guide you through process of selling.
What details/documents are required to do a Deal and get my Commission?

You can go to Account verification section and update your details and documents accordingly. The documents that you need to process your deal and release your commission are bank account, pan card and cancelled cheque for us.
How can I reach to company representatives for support?
You can reach out to us by calling on our support number in support button available in the app.
How will I start receiving leads?
You will receive the leads within 24 hours after your request.
What is a Lead ID?
Lead ID is the unique identification number assigned to the Leads to map it to one particular individual to avoid duplicate leads.
